Nov. 4, 2018 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Section A)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Section A) 200 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest annual-open-brass-band-contest
None
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire Overall Winner (William H. Birch Challenge Cup) - Westoe Winning Conductor (Fred H. Bradbury Cup) - Steve Malcolm (Westoe) Best Instrumentalist (YHBBA Glass Trophy - Dan Robson (Principal Cornet, Westoe) Best Championship Section Band (Sam Woodhouse Trophy + £200) - Westoe Best First Section Band (William Rowntree Rose Bowl + £200) - Lindley Best Second Section Band (Alfred Whitehead Memorial Cup + £200) - North Skelton Runner-up Second Section Band (British Steel Trophy + £100) - Cockerton Silver Band Drawn No.1 (£25) - Cockerton Silver
Oct. 16, 2018, 5:06 p.m. April 24, 2019, 3:19 p.m.
1 Westoe Band Steve Malcolm Trittico
2 Lindley Band Rob Westacott Cry of the Mountain
3 North Skelton Band Lewis Wilkinson The Saga of Haakon the Good
4 Cockerton Prize Silver Band Andrew Hunter Purcell Variants [Meechan]
5 Shirebrook Band Jim Henson Renaissance
